response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and potential benefits to you. We believe it could significantly enhance your life or business, offering unparalleled advantages that align with your goals and aspirations. Given its high value, we kindly request a consideration of $12,000 for this opportunity. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 12000}
